fabio souto


I'm a freelance web developer interested in data analysis and visualization.

I studied a Master Degree in Computer Engineering at the University of Vigo, then I went to CERN to work in the WLCG.

Now I'm a happy freelancer that creates awesome sites in Django and D3.js.

If you want to hire me or get in touch with me you can email me or find me on Twitter, Github or Stack Overflow

Fomento do emprendemento e a consolidación empresarial a través do traballo colaborativo. Vigo 2017.
